name: Cardiology
description: Expert cardiovascular care including diagnosis and treatment of heart diseases, arrhythmias, and hypertension management.
details: Our cardiologists use cutting-edge technology including echocardiograms, stress tests, and cardiac catheterization to provide comprehensive heart health assessment and treatment.

name: Dermatology
description: Complete skin, hair, and nail care using advanced dermatological treatments and cosmetic procedures.
details: Specialists in treating acne, psoriasis, eczema, and offering cosmetic treatments including laser therapy, chemical peels, and injectables.

name: Orthopedics
description: Surgical and non-surgical treatment of bone, joint, and ligament injuries.
details: Expert orthopedic surgeons providing treatment for fractures, arthritis, sports injuries, and joint replacement procedures.

name: Pediatrics
description: Comprehensive healthcare for infants, children, and adolescents from birth through teenage years.
details: Pediatricians specializing in vaccinations, growth monitoring, infectious diseases, and developmental assessments for children.

name: Neurology
description: Diagnosis and treatment of nervous system disorders including migraines, epilepsy, and Parkinson's disease.
details: Neurologists with expertise in headache management, sleep disorders, stroke prevention, and neurodegenerative diseases.

name: Gastroenterology
description: Specialized care for digestive system disorders and gastrointestinal health.
details: Experts in treating acid reflux, IBS, ulcers, Crohn's disease, and performing endoscopies and colonoscopies.

name: Pulmonology
description: Treatment of respiratory and lung diseases including asthma, COPD, and lung cancer.
details: Pulmonologists offering comprehensive lung function testing, sleep apnea treatment, and respiratory rehabilitation.

name: Oncology
description: Cancer diagnosis, treatment, and support services including chemotherapy and radiation therapy.
details: Multidisciplinary cancer care team providing personalized treatment plans and supportive care for cancer patients.

name: Gynecology
description: Women's reproductive health including obstetrics, fertility treatment, and gynecological surgery.
details: Gynecologists specializing in prenatal care, contraception counseling, menopausal management, and reproductive surgeries.

name: Psychiatry
description: Mental health and behavioral disorder treatment including therapy and medication management.
details: Psychiatrists treating depression, anxiety, bipolar disorder, PTSD, and other mental health conditions with evidence-based approaches.

name: Ophthalmology
description: Eye care including vision correction, cataract surgery, and treatment of eye diseases.
details: Ophthalmologists offering comprehensive eye exams, LASIK surgery, glaucoma management, and retinal treatments.

name: Urology
description: Specialized care for urinary tract and male reproductive system disorders.
details: Urologists treating kidney stones, prostate conditions, urinary incontinence, and performing urological surgeries.

name: Rheumatology
description: Treatment of joint, bone, and autoimmune diseases including arthritis and lupus.
details: Rheumatologists managing arthritis, autoimmune conditions, and inflammatory joint diseases with advanced therapeutics.

name: Endocrinology
description: Management of hormonal and metabolic disorders including diabetes and thyroid diseases.
details: Endocrinologists specializing in diabetes management, thyroid disorders, hormone replacement therapy, and metabolic conditions.

name: Nephrology
description: Kidney disease management including dialysis and transplant coordination.
details: Nephrologists treating chronic kidney disease, managing hypertension in renal patients, and coordinating kidney transplants.

name: Otolaryngology
description: Treatment of ear, nose, and throat disorders including hearing loss and sinusitis.
details: ENT specialists treating hearing impairment, balance disorders, chronic sinusitis, and performing head and neck surgeries.

name: General Surgery
description: Surgical treatment of abdominal, breast, and soft tissue conditions.
details: General surgeons performing appendectomies, hernia repairs, gallbladder removal, and other general surgical procedures.

name: Sports Medicine
description: Treatment and prevention of sports-related injuries and athletic performance optimization.
details: Sports medicine specialists treating athletes with musculoskeletal injuries, offering rehabilitation and return-to-play protocols.

name: Infectious Diseases
description: Diagnosis and treatment of bacterial, viral, and parasitic infections.
details: Infectious disease specialists managing complex infections, antibiotic stewardship, and travel medicine consultations.

name: Immunology
description: Treatment of immune system disorders including allergies and immunodeficiencies.
details: Immunologists treating allergic conditions, immunodeficiency disorders, and providing allergy testing and immunotherapy.
